attributes.action: Slash the number of traffic wardens
attributes.additional_details:
In these tough economic times, we want our taxes to pay for the salaries of; Doctors, Nurses, British Soldiers,
Teachers, and NOT to traffic wardens.

We call on the governement to slash the number of traffic wardens, and better allocate their salaries to those who positively contribute to this country's economic recovery.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual local authorities.
